titles.title: Older Americans' Housing Preservation Act
A bill to delay the effective date of regulations issued by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development governing the admission of single persons into public and assisted housing for the elderly.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13908-13909)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary: 10/19/1993--Introduced. Older Americans' Housing Preservation Act - Delays the effective date of certain regulations governing the admission of single persons into public and assisted housing for the elderly.
